name: HindiCounter
0:
”Alexa open Hindi Counter.”
”Alexa launch Hindi Counter.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hindi counter
des:
You can use Hindi Counter to have Alexa count for you in Hindi!

After you launch the skill, Alexa will ask you to provide a number. Alexa will count up to the number in Hindi.

You should provide your number in English. The maximum number accepted is 1,000.

To begin, say, "Alexa, open Hindi Counter!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
